data.name: CreateCsePersonAccount
CreateInterestSuppStatusHistory
CreateObligation1
CreateObligation2
CreateObligation3
CreateObligationPaymentSchedule
CreateObligorRule
CreatePaymentStatusHistory
CreateRecaptureInclusion
CreateStmtCouponSuppStatusHist
ReadCsePerson
data.value: select top(1) NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON where NUMB = @numb

data.name: ReadCsePersonAccount
data.value: select top(1) CSP_NUMBER, TYPE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST from CKT_CSE_PERSON_ACC where (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (TYPE = @type)

data.name: ReadDefaultRule
data.value: select top(1) RECAPTURE_RULE_ID, DTY_GENERATED_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, NEGOTIATED_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, NA_ARREARS_MAX_AMT, NA_ARREARS_AMOUNT, NA_ARREARS_PCT, NA_CURR_MAX_AMOUNT, NA_CURR_AMOUNT, NA_CURR_PERCENTAGE, PASSTHRU_PERCENTAG, PASSTHRU_AMOUNT, PASSTHRU_MAX_AMT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, DEFAULT_RULE_FILLE, TYPE, REPYMNT_LTR_PRT_DT from CKT_RECAPTURE_RULE with(readuncommitted) where (@dtyGeneratedId = DTY_GENERATED_ID) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE >= @discontinueDate) order by DISCONTINUE_DATE

data.name: ReadLegalAction
data.value: select top(1) LEGAL_ACTION_ID, FOREIGN_FIPS_ST, FOREIGN_ORDER_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACTION where LEGAL_ACTION_ID = @legalActionId

data.name: ReadLegalActionDetail
data.value: select top(1) LGA_IDENTIFIER, LA_DETAIL_NO from CKT_LEGAL_ACT_DTL where (LGA_IDENTIFIER = @lgaIdentifier) and (LA_DETAIL_NO = @laDetailNo)

data.name: ReadObligationType
data.value: select top(1) DEBT_TYP_ID, DEBT_TYP_CD, DEBT_TYP_NM, DEBT_TYP_CLASS, EFFECTIVE_DT, DISCONTINUE_DT, SUP_PRSN_REQ_IND from CKT_OB_TYPE where DEBT_TYP_CD = @debtTypCd

data.name: ReadObligorRule
data.value: select top(1) RECAPTURE_RULE_ID, CPA_D_TYPE, CSP_D_NUMBER, EFFECTIVE_DATE, NEGOTIATED_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, NA_ARREARS_MAX_AMT, NA_ARREARS_AMOUNT, NA_ARREARS_PCT, NA_CURR_MAX_AMOUNT, NA_CURR_AMOUNT, NA_CURR_PERCENTAGE, PASSTHRU_PERCENTAG, PASSTHRU_AMOUNT, PASSTHRU_MAX_AMT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, OBLIGOR_RULE_FILLE, TYPE, REPYMNT_LTR_PRT_DT from CKT_RECAPTURE_RULE where (@cpaDType = CPA_D_TYPE) and (@cspDNumber = CSP_D_NUMBER) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate)

data.name: ReadPaymentRequest
data.value: select top(1) PAYMENT_REQUEST_ID, PROCESS_DATE, TYPE, PRQ_R_GENERATED_ID from CKT_PMNT_REQUEST where PAYMENT_REQUEST_ID = @paymentRequestId

data.name: ReadPaymentStatus
data.value: select top(1) PAYMENT_STATUS_ID, CODE from CKT_PAYMENT_STATUS where CODE = 'RCVCRE'

data.name: ReadPaymentStatusHistory
data.value: select top(1) PST_GENERATED_ID, PRQ_GENERATED_ID, PYMNT_STAT_HIST_ID, EFFECTIVE_DATE, DISCONTINUE_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TIMESTAMP, REASON_TEXT from CKT_PMNT_STAT_HIST where (@prqGeneratedId = PRQ_GENERATED_ID) and (EFFECTIVE_DATE <= @effectiveDate) and (DISCONTINUE_DATE > @effectiveDate)

data.name: UpdatePaymentRequest#1
data.value: update CKT_PMNT_REQUEST set PROCESS_DATE = @processDate where PAYMENT_REQUEST_ID = @paymentRequestId

data.name: UpdatePaymentRequest#2
data.value: update CKT_OBLIGATION set PRQ_ID = @prqId where (CPA_TYPE = @cpaType) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and (OB_ID = @obId) and (DTY_GENERATED_ID = @dtyGeneratedId)

data.name: UpdatePaymentStatusHistory
data.value: update CKT_PMNT_STAT_HIST set DISCONTINUE_DATE = @discontinueDate where (PST_GENERATED_ID = @pstGeneratedId) and (PRQ_GENERATED_ID = @prqGeneratedId) and (PYMNT_STAT_HIST_ID = @pymntStatHistId)
